{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Aganazzar's Scorcher|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Jolting Jaunt
entries: You leap through space in a blur, smashing into a foe as you transform into lightning for a moment. You teleport to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. You can also choose up to one creature in a line 5 feet wide originating at the space you left and ending at the space you teleported to. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

On a failed saving throw, the target takes {@damage 3d10} lightning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Beluud's Brutal Jaunt}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the maximum number of creatures you can target increases by one for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Tailwind
entries: You release strong surge of roaring wind behind you that rockets you into the air. You fly up to 60 feet in a straight line and stop at the first creature you contact. You can choose to make a melee spell attack against the creature, hitting it with a magic barrier. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} thunder damage and {@damage 2d6} force damage, and it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a miss, the target takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

For this turn, your barrier grants you resistance to damage from falls, and falls do not knock you {@condition prone} upon landing. Upon finishing the movement and attack caused by this spell you fall if you are still aloft, unless you can stop the fall.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the force damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Azure Blaze
entries: You conjure a patch of magical blue flames in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range. A creature takes {@damage 4d4} fire damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried are ignited.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Cloud of Daggers}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 4d4|2-9|2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Devouring Haze
entries: You fill the air with misty acid in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range. A creature takes {@damage 4d4} acid damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Cloud of Daggers}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 4d4|2-9|2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Storm Blade
entries: You evoke an electric blade in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a scimitar, and it lasts for the duration. If you let go of the blade, it disappears, but you can evoke the blade again as a bonus action.
You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the electric blade. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage.
The electric blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Blade}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|2,4,6,8|1d6} for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Sunlight Blade
entries: You evoke a golden blade of light in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a scimitar, and it lasts for the duration. If you let go of the blade, it disappears, but you can evoke the blade again as a bonus action.
You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the sunlight blade. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} radiant damage.
The sunlight blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Blade}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|2,4,6,8|1d6} for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Ball Lightning

components.m: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

entries: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of lightning appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet. If you ram the sphere into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the sphere's damage, and the sphere stops moving this turn.

When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. The sphere ignites flammable objects not being worn or carried, and it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flaming Sphere}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Giant Snowball

components.m: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

entries: A 5-foot-diameter snow sphere appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet. If you ram the sphere into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the sphere's damage, and the sphere stops moving this turn.
When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flaming Sphere}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Electrify Metal

components.m: a piece of iron and a flame

entries: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to be filled with an electric current. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes {@damage 2d8} lightning damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your subsequent turns to cause this damage again.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heat Metal}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Freeze Metal

components.m: a piece of iron and a flame

entries: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to freeze. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your subsequent turns to cause this damage again.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heat Metal}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ringing Ray

m.text: blue amber worth at least 150gp

entries: A translucent beam of sonic vibrations leaps from your outstretched finger to strike one creature that you can see within range. You make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d8} thunder damage and can't take reactions until the end of your next turn.

If damage dealt by this spell forces the target to make a saving throw to maintain concentration, the DC is increased by an amount equal to your spellcasting modifier (minimum +1) and the target has disadvantage on the saving throw.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Jolt of Pain}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Electric Beam

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A thin beam of lightning streaks towards a target within range and leaves it briefly electrified. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} lightning damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} lightning damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the beam electrifies the target with lightning for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Freezing Beam

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A thin beam of blue-white energy streaks towards a target within range and chills it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} cold damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} cold damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the beam freezes the target for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Electric Beam

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A red-hot beam of searing lava streaks towards a target within range and burns it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} fire damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} fire damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the beam burns the target with fire for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Sonic Arrow

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A gray arrow streaks towards a target within range and bursts into a wave of sonic vibrations. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} thunder damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} thunder damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow attacks the target with sonic waves for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Shards
entries: You create three shards of ice and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Scorching Ray}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Darts
entries: You create three rays of lightning and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} lightning damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Scorching Rays}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Prismatic Beams
entries: You create three rays of colorful light and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} radiant damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Scorching Rays}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Spike Growth

components.m: seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened to a point

entries: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts small flowers coated with caustic acid. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 2d4} acid damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can't see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Spike Growth}}

spell.name: Searing Charcoal

components.m: seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened to a point

entries: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range is covered with searing charcoals hidden among dust. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 2d4} fire damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can't see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.
{@note This spell is a variant {@spell Spike Growth}}

spell.name: Storm Cloud
entries: You conjure a gloomy cloud over the head of one creature you can see within range. The cloud follows the target as it moves and releases small bolts of lightning down upon the target at random intervals. At the start of each of the target's turns while the cloud remains, the target and each other creature in the target's space must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 5d4} lightning damage.

The cloud lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. If the target ends any of its turns at least 50 feet away from where it began that turn, the spell immediatly ends. The target's space is lightly obscured for the duration.
{@note This spell is a variant {@spell Acid Cloud}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Smoking Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon is infused with scorching fire and blinding smoke, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 3d8} fire damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the spell ends.
A creature {@condition blinded} by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer {@condition blinded}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Blinding Smite}}

spell.name: Traitorous Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon flares with a blinding acid spray, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 3d8} acid damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the spell ends.
A creature {@condition blinded} by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer {@condition blinded}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Blinding Smite}}

spell.name: Acid Shower
entries: A green cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see within range directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the storm cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).

When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see under the cloud. A rain of acid pours from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to call down acid in this way again, targeting the same point or a different one.

If you are outdoors in heavy pollution conditions when you cast this spell, the spell gives you control over the existing pollution instead of creating a new one. Under such conditions, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Call Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or higher level, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Hail Blizzard
entries: A snowing cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see within range directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the snowing cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).

When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see under the cloud. A shards of ice fall down from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to call down ice in this way again, targeting the same point or a different one.

If you are outdoors in extreme cold conditions when you cast this spell, the spell gives you control over the existing storm instead of creating a new one. Under such conditions, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Call Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or higher level, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rain of Fire
entries: An ash cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see within range directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the storm cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).

When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see under the cloud. Streams of fire rain down from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to call down fire in this way again, targeting the same point or a different one.

If you are outdoors in in extreme heat conditions when you cast this spell, the spell gives you control over the existing storm instead of creating a new one. Under such conditions, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Call Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or higher level, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Caustic Burst

components.m: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

entries: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of acidic slime. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 8d6} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The acid spreads around corners.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fireball}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Electric Blast

components.m: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

entries: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into arcs of blue lightning in all directions. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 8d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The lightning spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fireball}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Chilled Arrows
entries: You touch a quiver containing arrows or bolts. When a target is hit by a ranged weapon attack using a piece of ammunition drawn from the quiver, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} cold damage. The spell's magic ends on a piece of ammunition when it hits or misses, and the spell ends when twelve pieces of ammunition have been drawn from the quiver.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Arrows|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of pieces of ammunition you can affect with this spell increases by two for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Corrosive Arrows
entries: You touch a quiver containing arrows or bolts. When a target is hit by a ranged weapon attack using a piece of ammunition drawn from the quiver, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} acid damage. The spell's magic ends on a piece of ammunition when it hits or misses, and the spell ends when twelve pieces of ammunition have been drawn from the quiver.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Arrows|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of pieces of ammunition you can affect with this spell increases by two for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Blazing Arrow
entries: The next time you make a ranged weapon attack during the spell's duration, the weapon's ammunition, or the weapon itself if it's a thrown weapon, transforms into a bolt of fire. Make the attack roll as normal. The target takes {@damage 4d8} fire damage on a hit, or half as much damage on a miss, instead of the weapon's normal damage.

Whether you hit or miss, each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. Each of these creatures takes {@damage 2d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The piece of ammunition or weapon then returns to its normal form.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Lightning Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage for both effects of the spell increases by {@scaledamage 4d8;2d8|3-9|1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Dissolving Arrow
entries: The next time you make a ranged weapon attack during the spell's duration, the weapon's ammunition, or the weapon itself if it's a thrown weapon, transforms into a bolt of splashing green acid. Make the attack roll as normal. The target takes {@damage 4d8} acid damage on a hit, or half as much damage on a miss, instead of the weapon's normal damage.

Whether you hit or miss, each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. Each of these creatures takes {@damage 2d8} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The piece of ammunition or weapon then returns to its normal form.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Lightning Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage for both effects of the spell increases by {@scaledamage 4d8;2d8|3-9|1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Flame Tongue

components.m: a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

entries: A swirling stream of licking flames forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The flames ignite flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Lightning Bolt}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Radiant Beam

components.m: a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

entries: A bright white beam of light forming a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 8d6} radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Lightning Bolt}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Ray of Rime

components.m: a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

entries: A howling blue-white beam of freezing energy forming a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 8d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Lightning Bolt}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Comet Swarm

components.m: niter, sulfur, and pine tar formed into a bead

entries: You create six tiny frosty comets in your space. They float in the air and orbit you for the spell's duration. When you cast the spell—and as a bonus action on each of your turns thereafter—you can expend one or two of the comets, sending them streaking toward a point or points you choose within 120 feet of you. Once a comet reaches its destination or impacts against a solid surface, the comet explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the point where the comet explodes must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Minute Meteors|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of comets created increases by two for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Crackling Orbs

components.m: niter, sulfur, and pine tar formed into a bead

entries: You create six tiny orbs of crackling lightning in your space. They float in the air and orbit you for the spell's duration. When you cast the spell—and as a bonus action on each of your turns thereafter—you can expend one or two of the orbs, sending them streaking toward a point or points you choose within 120 feet of you. Once an orb reaches its destination or impacts against a solid surface, the orb explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the point where the orb explodes must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Minute Meteors|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of meteors created increases by two for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Storm Nimbus
entries: You conjure a small storm cloud made solid by magic, which you leap atop as part of casting the spell and your magic causes it to float and fly. You gain a flying speed of 30 feet for the duration. While you fly in this way, the cloud remains beneath you and can provide half cover. If you fall while flying in this way, the spell ends immediately.
In addition, if you fly at least 20 feet straight toward a target using this flying speed on your turn, you can use your bonus action to slam the target using the cloud.
Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} thunder damage.
When the spell ends, the cloud turns to dust and you fall if you are still aloft, unless you can stop the fall.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Terra Steed}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the flying speed you gain increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Sonic Pulse
entries: You conjure up a wave of sound that crashes down on an area within range. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 4d8} thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Tidal Wave}}

spell.name: Frost Breath

components.m: a lead ring or green dragon's scale

entries: You exhale a gust of freezing wind in a 30 foot cone in front of you. Each creature in the cone must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 8d6} cold damage, and it is slowed until the start of your next turn. While slowed in this way, its speed is reduced by half. On a success, a creature takes half damage and is not slowed.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Toxic Breath}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Voice of Power
entries: You roar with a thunderous, deadly voice in a 30 foot cone in front of you. Each creature in the cone must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 8d6} thunder damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Toxic Breath}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Electrocute
entries: Electric energy washes over a creature of your choice that you touch, electrocuting it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes {@damage 8d8} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
If you target a creature that is swimming in water, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Blight}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d8|4-9|1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Heat Stroke
entries: Heat washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes {@damage 8d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
If you target a creature that has resistance or immunity to cold damage, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Blight}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d8|4-9|1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Icy Weapon
entries: You touch a weapon and wreathe it in magical ice. Until the spell ends, the weapon is magical if it wasn't already, and each time an attack using the weapon hits a creature, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@dice 2d8} extra cold damage from the attack.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Envenomed Weapon}}

spell.name: Jolting Weapon
entries: You touch a weapon and wreathe it in magical lightning. Until the spell ends, the weapon is magical if it wasn't already, and each time an attack using the weapon hits a creature, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@dice 2d8} extra lightning damage from the attack.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Envenomed Weapon}}

spell.name: Ringing Weapon
entries: You touch a weapon and it starts vibrating, emitting sonic waves. Until the spell ends, the weapon is magical if it wasn't already, and each time an attack using the weapon hits a creature, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@dice 2d8} extra thunder damage from the attack.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Envenomed Weapon}}

spell.name: Gravelslide
entries: The ground in a 60-foot cone is broken into gravel. Until the spell ends, ground in the area rolls and tumbles like a vicious rock grinder, making it difficult terrain. When the area appears, each creature in the area takes {@damage 2d4} bludgeoning damage and must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there takes {@damage 2d4} bludgeoning damage and must also succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

In addition, whenever a creature falls {@condition prone} within the area or ends its turn while {@condition prone} within the area, it takes {@damage 6d4} bludgeoning damage. This spell treats creatures that cannot be {@condition prone} as if they are always {@condition prone} instead.
This spell only affects creatures that are on the ground.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Glistening Acid Slick}}

spell.name: Molten Wave
entries: You transmute a thin wave of molten metal that covers the ground in a 60-foot cone. Until the spell ends, ground in the area is covered by the molten metal, making it difficult terrain. When the area appears, each creature in the area takes {@damage 2d4} fire damage. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there takes {@damage 2d4} fire damage.
A creature moving in the area must spend 4 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves.
This spell only affects creatures that are on the ground.
This spell ignites flammable objects on the ground in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Glistening Acid Slick}}

spell.name: Winter Wind
entries: A wave of nauseatingly cold air swirls briefly in a 50-foot cube emanating from you that spreads around corners. Each creature in the area other than you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes {@damage 4d10} cold damage, is {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn, and gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage, is not {@condition poisoned}, and doesn't gain any {@condition exhaustion}.

A creature has disadvantage on the saving throw if it has resistance or immunity to fire damage. If it has resistance to cold damage or immunity to cold damage, it has advantage on the saving throw and it can't gain any {@condition exhaustion} from the spell.
Any levels of {@condition exhaustion} caused by this spell are removed from a creature when it finishes a short or long rest in a cool or cold environment.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heat Wave}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Needle Shower

components.m: a pinch of dust and a few drops of water

entries: A rain of poisonous plant thorns pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 50-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d8} piercing damage and {@damage 4d6} poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Thorns turn the shower's area of effect into difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Ice Storm}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the piercing damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|4-9|1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Rain of Brimstone

components.m: a pinch of dust and a few drops of water

entries: A rain of flaming chunks of sulfur pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage and {@damage 4d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Brimstones turn the rain's area of effect into difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.
This spell ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Ice Storm}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|4-9|1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Scorching Roller
entries: You evoke an horizontal column made of rolling flames in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide.

The line extends in any direction and originates from any point you can see within range. The column slashes in a wide arc as it appears, forcing each creature in the area to make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success.

The column provides half-cover to creatures behind it. You can use a bonus action on subsequent turns to move one or both ends of the line to different locations up to 30 feet away that you can see. When you finish moving the area in this way on a turn, you may choose to have the column slash again, forcing all creatures in the area to repeat the Dexterity saving throw.
The column lasts until the spell ends, at which point it vanishes. If at any time you aren't within range of at least one end of the line, the spell ends.
This spell ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell March of Blades}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the fire damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Storm Coil
entries: You evoke a spiral of twisting storm blue-blue electricity that undulates and sparks at your command in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide.

The line extends in any direction and originates from any point you can see within range. The spiral slashes in a wide arc as it appear, forcing each creature in the area to make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success.

The spiral provides half-cover to creatures behind it. You can use a bonus action on subsequent turns to move one or both ends of the line to different locations up to 30 feet away that you can see. When you finish moving the area in this way on a turn, you may choose to have the spiral slash again, forcing all creatures in the area to repeat the Dexterity saving throw.
The spiral lasts until the spell ends, at which point it vanishes. If at any time you aren't within range of at least one end of the line, the spell ends.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell March of Blades}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the lightning damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Vibration Wave
entries: You create a faintly visible line that undulates and spikes at a specific frequence in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide.

The line extends in any direction and originates from any point you can see within range. The line slashes in a wide arc as it appears, forcing each creature in the area to make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success.

The line provides half-cover to creatures behind them. You can use a bonus action on subsequent turns to move one or both ends of the line to different locations up to 30 feet away that you can see. When you finish moving the area in this way on a turn, you may choose to have the line slash again, forcing all creatures in the area to repeat the Dexterity saving throw.
The line lasts until the spell ends, at which point they vanish. If at any time you aren't within range of at least one end of the line, the spell ends.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell March of Blades}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the slashing damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Vitriolic Twister
entries: You conjure a small cyclone of acid spinning horizantally that floats in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide.

The line extends in any direction and originates from any point you can see within range. The cyclone sprays acid in a wide arc as it appears, forcing each creature in the area to make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success.

The cyclone provides half-cover to creatures behind them. You can use a bonus action on subsequent turns to move one or both ends of the line to different locations up to 30 feet away that you can see. When you finish moving the area in this way on a turn, you may choose to have the cyclone spray again, forcing all creatures in the area to repeat the Dexterity saving throw.
The cyclone lasts until the spell ends, at which point it vanishes. If at any time you aren't within range of at least one end of the line, the spell ends.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell March of Blades}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the slashing damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Dazing Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon electrifies with dazing lightning, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 4d6} lightning damage to the target. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Staggering Smite}}

spell.name: Sand Jet
entries: You launch a pressurized jet of sand at one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 11d4} bludgeoning damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the blindness on a success. On a miss, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition blinded}.
Hit or miss, the target's space is filled with a cloud of dust that makes it lightly obscured until the end of your next turn or until a wind of any speed disperses it.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Steam Strike}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Sun Strike
entries: You launch a blast of focused sunlight at one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 11d4} radiant damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the blindness on a success. On a miss, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition blinded}.
Hit or miss, the target's space is filled with a cloud of sparkles that makes it dim light until the end of your next turn or until a wind of any speed disperses it.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Steam Strike}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Vitriolic Spray
entries: You launch a thin spray of acid at one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 11d4} acid damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the blindness on a success. On a miss, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition blinded}.
Hit or miss, the target's space is filled with a cloud of vile mist that makes it lightly obscured until the end of your next turn or until a wind of any speed disperses it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Radiant Prisons

components.m: an acorn for each tree sprouted

entries: You cause up to four transparent floating prisons formed out of angular light at locations of your choice that you can see within range. Each creature that is directly above one of the locations must make a Dexterity saving throw, as the cages suddenly grow to full size. On a success, a creature can use its reaction to move up to half its speed to an unoccupied space to escape. If it does not, it is trapped by the cage.

Each creature trapped inside the cages is {@condition restrained}. A trapped creature can use its action to make a Strength or Dexterity check (its choice) against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.

You decide each cage's height. They can be as short as 5 feet and as tall as 20 feet. Once per turn when a trapped creature makes a weapon attack or fails an ability check to escape, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} radiant damage.
When the spell ends, the cages vanish, and any creatures trapped inside are freed. A freed creature falls if it cannot fly or climb the tree using a climbing speed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number of trees you can cause to sprout increases by one for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Cinder Storm

components.m: a drop of giant slug bile

entries: You point at a location within range, and a glowing 1-foot-diameter ball of searing hot cinders streaks there and explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 10d4} fire damage and another {@damage 5d4} fire damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
This spell ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Vitriolic Sphere|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@scaledamage 10d4|4-9|2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Wall of Acid
entries: You create a wall of acid on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 5d8} fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals {@damage 5d8} acid damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Wall of Fire}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 5d8|4-9|1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Wall of Lightning
entries: You create a wall of lightning on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 5d8} lightning damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals {@damage 5d8} lightning damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Wall of Fire}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 5d8|4-9|1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Howling Tornado

components.m: a small crystal or glass cone

entries: A swirling tunnel of crushing air pressure and roaring sound erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 50-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 8d8} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Howling Tornado}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d8|5-9|1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Flame Dragon Claws

components.m: a bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass or a crystal rod; and four copper pins

entries: Your hands are covered in fire as you create 4 lines, each 100 feet long and 5 feet wide, emanating from you in directions of your choice. Each line has its own direction and lines can overlap, but they must all fit within a 180 degree angle from you.

Each creature within the spell's area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 7d6} fire damage plus {@damage 1d6} fire damage for each line area that they are within. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you create an additional line of fire for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Gastric Spray

components.m: a bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass or a crystal rod; and four copper pins

entries: Your hands cover in acid as you create 4 lines, each 100 feet long and 5 feet wide, emanating from you in directions of your choice. Each line has its own direction and lines can overlap, but they must all fit within a 180 degree angle from you.

Each creature within the spell's area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 7d6} acid damage plus {@damage 1d6} acid damage for each line area that they are within. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fingers of Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you create an additional line of acid for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Hand of Winter

components.m: a bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass or a crystal rod; and four copper pins

entries: Your hands cover in snow as you create 4 lines, each 100 feet long and 5 feet wide, emanating from you in directions of your choice. Each line has its own direction and lines can overlap, but they must all fit within a 180 degree angle from you.

Each creature within the spell's area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 7d6} cold damage plus {@damage 1d6} cold damage for each line area that they are within. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fingers of Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you create an additional line of snow for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mass Light Beam

components.m: a bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass or a crystal rod; and four copper pins

entries: Your hands cover in light as you create 4 lines, each 100 feet long and 5 feet wide, emanating from you in directions of your choice. Each line has its own direction and lines can overlap, but they must all fit within a 180 degree angle from you.

Each creature within the spell's area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 7d6} radiant damage plus {@damage 1d6} radiant damage for each line area that they are within. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fingers of Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you create an additional line of light for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Arctic Aurora
entries: A vertical column of icy starlight roars down from the heavens in a location you specify. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage and {@damage 4d6} radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Strike}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the cold damage or the radiant damage (your choice) increases by {@scaledamage 4d6|5-9|1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Greater Thunderbolt
entries: A vertical column of roaring lightning roars down from the heavens in a location you specify. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 4d6} lightning damage and {@damage 4d6} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Strike}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the lightning damage or the thunder damage (your choice) increases by {@scaledamage 4d6|5-9|1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Brain Fungus
entries: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide. If the creature can understand you, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by you after 12 hours since failing the saving throw for the duration. While the creature is {@condition charmed} by you, it takes {@damage 5d10} psychic damage each time it acts in a manner directly counter to your instructions, but no more than once each day. A creature that can't understand you is unaffected by the spell.
You can issue any command you choose, short of an activity that would result in certain death. Should you issue a suicidal command, the spell ends.
You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it. A {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or {@spell wish} spell also ends it.
The effect counts as a disease and can be cured, ending the spell. Creatures immune to disease are unaffected by this spell.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Geas}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th or 8th level, the duration is 1 year. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the spell lasts until it is ended by one of the spells mentioned above.

spell.name: Lightning Strike
entries: You bellow a determined prayer that calls down a dazing bolt from the heavens to crush a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes {@damage 5d8} lightning damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition stunned}.
If the target is outside and underneath the sky, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d8}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heavenly Pillar}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Snow Flurry
entries: You bellow a determined prayer that calls down a pillar whirling ice and snow from the heavens to crush a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes {@damage 5d8} cold damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition stunned}.
If the target is outside and underneath the sky, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d8}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heavenly Pillar}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Acid Bath
entries: Acid wreathes one creature you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 8d6} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, the target also burns for the spell's duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw. It takes {@damage 4d6} acid damage on a failed save, and the spell ends on a successful one. These magical flames can't be extinguished by nonmagical means.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Immolation|XGE}}

spell.name: Reverberating Armor
entries: You wreathe yourself in weightless magical armoring crafted from plates of amber colored sound waves. Until the spell ends, you shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an extra 20 feet. You also gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: When a creature within 10 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, the plates burst with beams of light. The attacker takes {@damage 3d6} thunder damage, and other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you take half that damage.
Attacks made against you have disadvantage.
Du hast eine Resistenz gegen Strahlungsschaden.

entries: In addition, if you are critically hit before the spell ends, you can use your reaction to end the spell causing the plates to explode in a protective blast of sound. The attack misses, and the attacker as well as each creature of your choice within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition deafened} until the end of your next turn.
When the spell ends, the magical plates vanish.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Shining Armor}}

spell.name: Tempestuous Armor
entries: You wreathe yourself in weightless magical armoring crafted from plates of dark stormcloud that crackle with lightning. Until the spell ends, you shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an extra 20 feet. You also gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: When a creature within 10 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, the plates burst with beams of light. The attacker takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage, and other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you take half that damage.
Attacks made against you have disadvantage.
Du hast eine Resistenz gegen Strahlungsschaden.

entries: In addition, if you are critically hit before the spell ends, you can use your reaction to end the spell, causing the plates to explode in a protective blast of light. The attack misses, and the attacker as well as each creature of your choice within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away.
When the spell ends, the magical plates vanish.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Shining Armor}}

spell.name: Kinetic Fireball
entries: A bead of fiery force rockets from your fingertips toward a point you can see within range, where it explodes into a wave of fire that expands to a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature within the area must make a Constitution saving throw.

On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 5d10} fire damage, is {@condition deafened} until the end of your next turn, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 20 feet away from the center of the area. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}, pushed, or {@condition deafened}.
Unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 20 feet away from the center of the area by the spell's effect.
This spell ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sonic Boom}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} and the distance a creature is pushed increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Belching Aperture
entries: You conjure a belching portal to a minor plane of acid which rises from the ground at a point that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The portal sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, which is sunlight. The portal is incorporeal and does not occupy space. You can use a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends to cause the portal to release acid in a blast. Choose one of the following two options each time you do so.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries: Choose either a 15-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the portal, a 40-foot cone blasting from the portal, or a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasting from the portal. Each creature in the chosen area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Constructs and earth elementals have disadvantage on this roll.

entries.name: Single Target
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a target within 150 feet of the portal that you can see. Determine cover and line of effect for this attack as if it was made from the portal's location rather than your location. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} acid damage. You have advantage on this attack roll against undead and oozes.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sun Flower|TEB}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Ghostfire Dragon
entries: You conjure a huge spectral dragon head which rises from the ground at a point that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The dragon head sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, which is sunlight. The dragon head is incorporeal and does not occupy space. You can use a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends to cause the dragon head to release blazing blue flames in a blast. Choose one of the following two options each time you do so.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries: Choose either a 15-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the dragon head, a 40-foot cone blasting from the dragon head, or a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasting from the dragon head. Each creature in the chosen area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Creatures that are ablaze have disadvantage on this roll.

entries.name: Single Target
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a target within 150 feet of the dragon head that you can see. Determine cover and line of effect for this attack as if it was made from the dragon head's location rather than your location. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage. You have advantage on this attack roll against creatures that are ablaze.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sun Flower}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Storm Conduit
entries: You conjure a huge spinning coil of sparking blue lightning which rises from the ground at a point that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The coil sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, which is sunlight. The coil is incorporeal and does not occupy space. You can use a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends to cause the coil to release blue lightning in a blast. Choose one of the following two options each time you do so.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries: Choose either a 15-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the coil, a 40-foot cone blasting from the coil, or a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasting from the coil. Each creature in the chosen area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Creatures wearing metal have disadvantage on this roll.

entries.name: Single Target
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a target within 150 feet of the coil that you can see. Determine cover and line of effect for this attack as if it was made from the coil's location rather than your location. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} lightning damage. You have advantage on this attack roll against creatures wearing metal.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sun Flower}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Thunder Bell
entries: You conjure a huge spectral sunbell which rises from the ground at a point that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The bell sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, which is sunlight. The bell is incorporeal and does not occupy space. You can use a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends to cause the bell to release blazing sunlight in a blast. Choose one of the following two options each time you do so.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries: Choose either a 15-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the bell, a 40-foot cone blasting from the bell, or a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasting from the bell. Each creature in the chosen area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Creatures made of inorganic materials, such as stone, crystal or metal, have disadvantage on this roll.

entries.name: Single Target
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a target within 150 feet of the bell that you can see. Determine cover and line of effect for this attack as if it was made from the bell's location rather than your location. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} thunder damage. You have advantage on this attack roll against creatures made of inorganic material, such as  stone, crystal, or metal.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sun Flower}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Winter Spirit
entries: You conjure a spectral spirit of winter which rises from the ground at a point that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The spirit sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, which is sunlight. The spirit is incorporeal and does not occupy space. You can use a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends to cause the spirit to exhale frosty mist. Choose one of the following two options each time you do so.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries: Choose either a 15-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the spirit, a 40-foot cone blasting from the spirit, or a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasting from the spirit. Each creature in the chosen area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. water elementals and plants have disadvantage on this roll.

entries.name: Single Target
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a target within 150 feet of the spirit that you can see. Determine cover and line of effect for this attack as if it was made from the spirit's location rather than your location. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} cold damage. You have advantage on this attack roll against water elementals and plants.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sun Flower}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Water to Steam

components.m: a vial of acid and a lump of coal

entries: Choose a point you can see within range inside a body of water. The portions of that body of water that fit inside a 50-foot cube centered on that point become hot steam until the spell ends. Any creature that ends its turn within the area takes {@damage 7d4} fire damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. Objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried also take damage at the end of each of your turns.

While the spell lasts, your magic keeps the steam in the area from mingling with the surrounding water. When the spell ends, the steam returns to its original form as water. This does not alter the composition of the water.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Water to Acid}}

spell.name: Blazing Eagle
entries: You hurl fire in the shape of an eagle at one creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6 + 15} fire damage and the spell ends. This spell ignores resistance, and targets with vulnerability to slashing damage have vulnerability to the spell's damage.

On a miss, the eagle flies past the target and begins flying through the air on its own, seeking out another target. Note the location of your target when you cast the spell. At the start of your next turn, you must repeat the spell attack (no action) against the creature within range that is now closest to that space, possibly even attacking yourself. If this attack misses or has no target, repeat this process using the location of the last target when the spell attacked it, repeating the attack each round until the spell ends.

The eagle uses {@sense blindsight} to find its targets, not vision, and it weaves around obstacles to reach its target, so subsequent attacks after the first ignore half cover and three-quarters cover and do not suffer disadvantage if you cannot see the target. If multiple creatures are tied for being the closest to the eagle when you repeat the attack, you choose which one the eagle attacks.
The eagle damages objects in its path that aren't being worn or carried. When this spell destroys an object or kills a creature, it is sliced in twain.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Annihilation Disk|TEB}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Ravenous Acid Wyrm
entries: You hurl acid in the shape of a dragon at one creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6 + 15} acid damage and the spell ends. This spell ignores resistance, and targets with vulnerability to slashing damage have vulnerability to the spell's damage.

On a miss, the dragon flies past the target and begins flying through the air on its own, seeking out another target. Note the location of your target when you cast the spell. At the start of your next turn, you must repeat the spell attack (no action) against the creature within range that is now closest to that space, possibly even attacking yourself. If this attack misses or has no target, repeat this process using the location of the last target when the spell attacked it, repeating the attack each round until the spell ends.

The dragon uses blindsight to find its targets, not vision, and it weaves around obstacles to reach its target, so subsequent attacks after the first ignore half cover and three-quarters cover and do not suffer disadvantage if you cannot see the target. If multiple creatures are tied for being the closest to the dragon when you repeat the attack, you choose which one the dragon attacks.
The dragon damages objects in its path that aren't being worn or carried. When this spell destroys an object or kills a creature, it is sliced in twain.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Annihilation Disk|TEB}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Storm Serpent
entries: You hurl lightning in the shape of a flying snake at one creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6 + 15} lightning damage and the spell ends. This spell ignores resistance, and targets with vulnerability to slashing damage have vulnerability to the spell's damage.

On a miss, the serpent flies past the target and begins flying through the air on its own, seeking out another target. Note the location of your target when you cast the spell. At the start of your next turn, you must repeat the spell attack (no action) against the creature within range that is now closest to that space, possibly even attacking yourself. If this attack misses or has no target, repeat this process using the location of the last target when the spell attacked it, repeating the attack each round until the spell ends.

The serpent uses blindsight to find its targets, not vision, and it weaves around obstacles to reach its target, so subsequent attacks after the first ignore half cover and three-quarters cover and do not suffer disadvantage if you cannot see the target. If multiple creatures are tied for being the closest to the serpent when you repeat the attack, you choose which one the serpent attacks.
The serpent damages objects in its path that aren't being worn or carried. When this spell destroys an object or kills a creature, it is sliced in twain.
